What are the treatments for Huntington disease ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Huntington disease:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Huntington Disease  - Genetic Testing Registry: Huntington's chorea  - Huntington's Disease Society of America: HD Care  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Huntington Disease  - University of Washington Medical Center: Testing for Huntington Disease: Making an Informed Choice   These resources
